title: Recognizing family investment as care economy transaction
description: Recognizing family investment as care economy transaction
content:
Scenario: Recognizing family investment as care economy transaction
    Given Kenji's family invests time, money, and emotional energy in his development
    And Kenji invests in family relationships and contributes what he can
    When the family_elohim tracks family care economy
    Then it should recognize mutual investment across generations
    And it should value family support of student as care contribution
    And it should value student's family participation as reciprocal care
    And family economy should be understood as long-term reciprocal exchange
    And the system should frame family support as investment in flourishing
    And intergenerational care should be recognized as care economy foundation
